orderDescription1: DNS Anycast improves DNS resolution performance for your domain
orderDescription2: by replicating your DNS servers across multiple points of presence.
activationNotice: Activation delay after payment is approximately 24 hours.
propagationNotice: DNS propagation may take up to 48 additional hours.
orderSuccessDesc: Your DNS Anycast order has been registered. Activation will be effective within 24 hours after payment validation.
activeDescription: DNS Anycast is active for {{domain}}. Your DNS queries are replicated across multiple points of presence.
benefitPerformanceDesc: Reduced DNS resolution time thanks to geographic proximity of servers.
benefitAvailabilityDesc: High availability with replication across multiple datacenters.
benefitCoverageDesc: Points of presence in Europe, North America and Asia.
